properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique id of character

properties.name: xOffset
properties.description: x-offset to apply when rendering character

properties.name: yOffset
properties.description: y-offset to apply when rendering character.

properties.name: xAdvance
properties.description: Advancement to apply to next character.

properties.name: kerning
properties.description: The kerning values for this character.

properties.name: texture
properties.description: The texture of the character.

properties.name: page
properties.description: The raw data of a character in a bitmap font. / export interface RawCharData extends Omit<CharData, 'texture'> { /** The page of the font texture that the character is on.

properties.name: x
properties.description: The x position of the character in the page.

properties.name: y
properties.description: The y position of the character in the page.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the character in the page.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the character in the page.

properties.name: letter
properties.description: The letter of the character.

properties.name: baseLineOffset
properties.description: The raw data of a bitmap font. / export interface BitmapFontData { /** The offset of the font face from the baseline.

properties.name: chars
properties.description: The map of characters by character code.

properties.name: pages
properties.description: The map of base page textures (i.e., sheets of glyphs).

properties.name: file
properties.description: File name

properties.name: lineHeight
properties.description: The line-height of the font face in pixels.

properties.name: fontSize
properties.description: The size of the font face in pixels.

properties.name: fontFamily
properties.description: The name of the font face.

properties.name: distanceField
properties.description: The range and type of the distance field for this font.

properties.name: range
properties.description: Range of the distance field in pixels
